data.name: Hunt for Junk
data.detailed_description:
About the Game:


Hunt for Junk is a retro Platformer that follows the graphical limitations of the classic Gameboy (e.g. 4 colors and a 160x144px resolution). Journey the world in your unending pursuit of delicious Junkfood! Avoid traps, fight enemies, collect coins and discover all of the hidden Junkfood items!

Features:


  • 10 Stages: 6 Main Stages with alternative routes to discover 4 hidden Bonus Stages
  • Highscore System: optimize your run either for fastest time, most coins collected or overall Highscore
  • 10 hidden collectable Junkfood Items
  • Playtime of 30 to 90 Minutes

If you like my game please follow me on Twitter: @thebossforge

data.short_description: Hunt for Junk is a retro Platformer that follows the graphical limitations of the classic Gameboy (e.g. 4 colors and a 160x144px resolution). Journey the world in your unending pursuit of delicious Junkfood! Avoid traps, fight enemies, collect coins and discover all of the hidden Junkfood items!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
